'Krasnaya Zvezda' (, literally "Red Star") is an official newspaper of Soviet
and later Russian Ministry of Defence. It was founded on January 1, 1924. Today
its official designation is "Central Organ of the Russian Ministry of Defence."
categories: Newspapers published in the Soviet Union
